ThingDef.Name: 6x20mmCaselessBase
ThingDef.description: Caseless bullet with a solid propellant enveloping the projectile. Guns chambered in 6x20mm caseless can also be chambered in 6x18mm charged.

ThingDef.Name: 6x26mmCaselessBase
ThingDef.description: Caseless bullet with a solid propellant enveloping the projectile. Guns chambered in 6x26mm caseless can also be chambered in 6x24mm charged.

ThingDef.Name: 8x37mmCaselessBase
ThingDef.description: Caseless bullet with a solid propellant enveloping the projectile. Guns chambered in 8x37mm caseless can also be chambered in 8x35mm charged.
